alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:55AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Locally Slippery Conditions This Morning... Bands of light snow and sleet are lifting northward across the eastern Catskills, mid Hudson Valley, Helderbergs, Schoharie Valley, Greater Capital Region, Taconics, Berkshires and northwestern Connecticut for the morning hours. Although precipitation is mainly light in intensity, a light coating of snow and ice may accumulate, especially on colder and untreated surfaces. A dusting to half inch is possible for many locations. Traveling and walking conditions may be slick, so use caution through the morning hours. Temperatures will be warming above freezing for all areas by later this morning.
